name: Tyler Austin
rvw: They’re extremely portable, so you can fit them in your backpack or clip them to your bike if you want some music while you cycle.

name: Mathew Philip
rvw: Simple to use, in that they usually have minimal, intuitive controls and can start playing music as soon as you’ve connected your device.

name: Nicholas Rodriguez
rvw: Connectivity can be a bit unreliable, as you need to be within range - it also just takes a stubborn device to spoil all the fun.

name: Shawn Samson
rvw: They often pick up everything that your paired device does, so everyone may hear your text and email notifications.

name: Delores Taylor
rvw: Both are working well and we have linked them together to form a true stereo sound. Batteries last and no problems so far.

name: Claire Campbell
rvw: I charge it so I can use it in the future; I then preparedly go to use it and it lasts for approx 25 minutes, no more, I need to find another brand and buy.

name: Melissa Harvey
rvw: Bought on special as discontinued, newer model inbound. Was important to have a smash-proof and waterproof speaker as young kids are rough.

name: Deanna Arnold
rvw: Only issue is the charging connector seems fragile. Takes a few goes to correctly insert supplied usb male connector into female on device.

name: Kelly Hadson
rvw: Waterproof, good and clear sound, extremely resistant. What else would I expect from a a sound box? Nothing. I love mine, maybe I will just update it to the new models

name: Donald Rhodes
rvw: overall a great speaker! It is waterproof so it can sit next to a pool or near the shower without being damaged, and it is also drop resistant so it doesn't get damaged when it is dropped.

name: Gary King
rvw: I just love this portable speaker, It produces good sound and bass for its intended purpose. I mainly use the Boom 2 on trail rides with my cycling group.

name: Lance Meyer
rvw: Our first Bluetooth speaker and couldn’t be happier. It’s light and easy to carry around when travelling and has a great sound with most genres of music we have tried.
